introSection.title: Telecommunication & Electronic engineering
introSection.description: Telecommunication technology is the communication system over long distance by transmitting electrical signal via cable,Where Electrical technology focuses on a design of integrated circuit.

outlineSection.title:
Undergraduate Degree
Curriculum 
Outline
outlineSection.description: Telecommunication and Electrical Engineering integrate two technologies including Telecommunication technology and Electrical Technology. Telecommunication technology is the communication system over long distance by transmitting electrical signal via cable, propagating electromagnetic wave (wireless) or light signal, base on the fundamental of electricity and electronics. Electronics technology focuses on a design of integrated circuit with components such as diode, transistor, resistor, capacitor, sensors and other components in order to control electron flow (electricity). Our department provides quality education for students to be able to design system and devices in both technologies to solve social problems, to be able to conduct research, and to be able to continue to pursuit graduate studies. With our curriculum, students will be able to do group work effectively with leadership and entrepreneurship. After graduate from our program, students are qualified to work in mobile operation companies, Internet service providing companies, TV / Radio Stations, Airports/seaports, factories, and public/private institutions.

job.label: Computer Network Administrator
job.description: professional who ensures that an organization's computer networks groups of computers that share information with one another are operating to meet the needs of the organization

job.label: Telecommunication and Electronics System Manager
job.description: Network engineers plan, construct and manage networks to ensure they're optimized and functioning as intended.

job.label: Electrical Engineer
job.description: design, develop, test, and supervise the manufacture of electrical equipment, such as electric motors, radar and navigation systems, communications systems, or power generation equipment

job.label: Telecommunication Engineer
job.description: Telecommunications engineers design, test and build the various technologies that allow people to communicate over distances

job.label: broadcasting Engineering
job.description: Broadcast engineering is the field of electrical engineering, and now to some extent computer engineering and information technology, which deals with radio and television broadcasting

eventLinkSection.title: Collaboration &  Opportunities
eventLinkSection.description: Based on knowledge's which are provided by IT Engineering department, graduates can work as Designer/Developer of Computer & Mobile  Software, Database System Analyst/Developer, Network Engineer, and Game Developer.

research.title: Asean factori 4.0 Project
research.description: Asean Factori 4.0 project propose to contribute to this challenge by the design of a set of industrial automation labs with a corresponding staff training program to initiate the foundation of center of excellence in Automation.
research.author: Telecommunication & electronic Engineering

project.title: Computer Numerical Control
project.description: is automated machine which are operated by computer executing pre-programmed software and code to controls the movement of production equipment. In which a smaller scale it can use to write, draw, engrave, etc.

project.title: Obstacle avoiding car
project.description: Obstacle Avoiding Car is an intelligent device which can automatically sense the obstacle in front of it and avoid them by turning itself either right or left by using Arduino components and Ultrasonic sensor.

project.title: Robot Arm
project.description: Hand Robot is a type of mechanical hand that functions similar to a human hand. It can catch or drop an object from one place to another by using Potentiometer and Servo to control that Hand Robot.

project.title: LED Transmission
project.description: Audio Transmission via LED is one of the wireless communication system. In the process signals is converted into light to transmit to the receiver which used a solar panel that absorb the light and convert it into audio signal.
